subject: Re: Capture Image in HtmlUnit
msgSnippet: ... An XPath expression would probably do it. Me - I d give the image an ID if I wanted to test it that badly.
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, saldin samuel <saldin_s@y...> wrote:
> It would be great if anyone can tell me how to capture
> the image as HtmlImage for the above script which does
> not have Id or Name attribute.

An XPath expression would probably do it. Me - I'd give the image an
ID if I wanted to test it that badly.
